mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_payment (PaymentID,ReserveID,PayMethod,CurrentStatus,PayTime) VALUES (paymentId, reserveId, payMethod, CurrentStatus, payTime)
mapper.select: SELECT PaymentID, ReserveID, PayMethod, CurrentStatus, PayTime From tbl_payment

select count (*) as count, p.PaymentID, c.username, t.theaterName, sc.ScreenNm ,m.movieNm, sh.showTime, se.SeatNum , p.payMethod , p.CurrentStatus, p.payTime FROM tbl_payment AS p INNER JOIN tbl_reserve As r on p.ReserveID = r.ReserveID INNER JOIN tbl_customer AS c on r.CustomerID = c.CustomerID INNER JOIN tbl_show AS sh on r.showID = sh.ShowID INNER JOIN tbl_screen As sc on sh.ScreenID = sc.ScreenID INNER JOIN tbl_theater AS t on sc.TheaterID = t.TheaterID INNER JOIN tbl_movie As m on sh.MovieCd = m.movieCd INNER JOIN tbl_showSeat AS ss on r.ReserveID = ss.ReserveID INNER JOIN tbl_seat As se on ss.SeatID = se.SeatID
